turns.answer:
You're no mafia.

You're a social deduction game. Find the person you're supposed to be playing on the internet. The same way you find the person you're supposed to be playing on the street.

You're
turns.label: lie

turns.answer: Your brother and I were talking about my brother and our friends. The man who took out my phone with his gun pointed it at my face. I remember telling him my story. I could tell that he knew about a guy called
turns.label: unknown
